title: Installation issue: llvm; spack environment; external compiler; bad rpath
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install llvm@6.0.1%gcc@9.2.0~all_targets build_type=Release +clang+compiler-rt+gold+internal_unwind+libcxx+link_dylib+lld+lldb~omp_tsan+polly~python~shared_libs arch=linux-centos7-haswell
...
../../../../../bin/llvm-tblgen: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.20' not found (required by ../../../../../bin/llvm-tblgen)
../../../../../bin/llvm-tblgen: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `CXXABI_1.3.8' not found (required by ../../../../../bin/llvm-tblgen)
../../../../../bin/llvm-tblgen: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.21' not found (required by ../../../../../bin/llvm-tblgen)
make[2]: *** [tools/clang/include/clang/Driver/Options.inc.tmp] Error 1

```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a
Linux darwin-fe1.lanl.gov 3.10.0-1062.1.1.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Sep 13 22:55:44 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.7.1908 (Core)
``` 

- My relevant `spack.yaml` Environment bits:
```commandline
spack:
  include:
  - ../../../../etc/spack/linux/packages.yaml
  - ../../../../etc/spack/mirrors.yaml
  - ../../../../etc/spack/modules.yaml
  - ../../../../etc/spack/repos.yaml
  specs:
  - llvm
```

- My relevant `../../../../etc/spack/linux/packages.yaml` bits:
```commandline
packages:
  all:
    compiler: ['gcc@9.2.0']
  llvm:
    variants: ['+link_dylib']
    version: ['6.0.1']
```
- My `../../../../etc/spack/linux/compilers.yaml`:
```commandline
compilers:
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules:
    - 'gcc/9.2.0'
    operating_system: centos7
    paths:
      cc: /projects/opt/x86_64/gcc/9.2.0/bin/gcc
      cxx: /projects/opt/x86_64/gcc/9.2.0/bin/g++
      f77: /projects/opt/x86_64/gcc/9.2.0/bin/gfortran
      fc: /projects/opt/x86_64/gcc/9.2.0/bin/gfortran
    spec: gcc@9.2.0
    target: x86_64
```

### Additional information

This is most certainly an rpath issue - llvm is building intermediary binaries to execute during its complete build cycle whose rpaths resolve to a system libstdc++.so before any provided by my configured gcc@9.2.0 compiler.  Some more details:

```console
$ spack build-env llvm | grep -i rpath
SPACK_CC_RPATH_ARG=-Wl,-rpath,
SPACK_COMPILER_IMPLICIT_RPATHS=/projects/opt/x86_64/gcc/9.2.0/lib/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/9.2.0:/projects/opt/x86_64/gcc/9.2.0/lib64
SPACK_CXX_RPATH_ARG=-Wl,-rpath,
SPACK_F77_RPATH_ARG=-Wl,-rpath,
SPACK_FC_RPATH_ARG=-Wl,-rpath,
SPACK_RPATH_DIRS=/projects/shavano/packages/DWX86G/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-haswell/gcc-9.2.0/llvm-6.0.1-ubw7yfm762ridzao7vetl5leqzb7doqc/lib:/projects/shavano/packages/DWX86G/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-haswell/gcc-9.2.0/llvm-6.0.1-ubw7yfm762ridzao7vetl5leqzb7doqc/lib64:/projects/shavano/packages/DWX86G/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-haswell/gcc-9.2.0/pcre-8.42-5l6cyodg32is2knv3cq3xdkfqppl7pyz/lib:/projects/shavano/packages/DWX86G/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-haswell/gcc-9.2.0/gettext-0.19.8.1-j7kkyaninjrqyghhaqc2vvjoim4tzwth/lib:/projects/shavano/packages/DWX86G/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-haswell/gcc-9.2.0/libedit-3.1-20170329-4y2hnj7l5tmwythhkz2rs2dhvx7c7vet/lib:/projects/shavano/packages/DWX86G/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-haswell/gcc-9.2.0/zlib-1.2.11-35samuwqrkyjaoigifegblhqx5idjwse/lib:/projects/shavano/packages/DWX86G/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-haswell/gcc-9.2.0/binutils-2.32-p5xuojl4b3ziamr362ct7cccqw4u7vo3/lib
```

```console
$ readelf -d llvm-tblgen | grep -i rpath 
 0x000000000000000f (RPATH)              Library rpath: [/projects/shavano/packages/DWX86G/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-haswell/gcc-9.2.0/llvm-6.0.1-ubw7yfm762ridzao7vetl5leqzb7doqc/lib:/projects/shavano/packages/DWX86G/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-haswell/gcc-9.2.0/llvm-6.0.1-ubw7yfm762ridzao7vetl5leqzb7doqc/lib64:/projects/shavano/packages/DWX86G/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-haswell/gcc-9.2.0/binutils-2.32-p5xuojl4b3ziamr362ct7cccqw4u7vo3/lib:/projects/shavano/packages/DWX86G/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-haswell/gcc-9.2.0/gettext-0.19.8.1-j7kkyaninjrqyghhaqc2vvjoim4tzwth/lib:/usr/lib:/projects/shavano/packages/DWX86G/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-haswell/gcc-9.2.0/zlib-1.2.11-35samuwqrkyjaoigifegblhqx5idjwse/lib:/projects/shavano/packages/DWX86G/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-haswell/gcc-9.2.0/libedit-3.1-20170329-4y2hnj7l5tmwythhkz2rs2dhvx7c7vet/lib:/projects/shavano/packages/DWX86G/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-haswell/gcc-9.2.0/pcre-8.42-5l6cyodg32is2knv3cq3xdkfqppl7pyz/lib:/usr/lib64:/projects/opt/x86_64/gcc/9.2.0/lib/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/9.2.0:/projects/opt/x86_64/gcc/9.2.0/lib64]
```
(Note: /usr/lib64 comes before my compiler's lib64!!!)
